EmailTemplate.description: Sent to customer when a case is in Awaiting Customer Response for more than 7 days
EmailTemplate.name: Case - Case Closed No Response (LT)
EmailTemplate.subject: We need more info to assist you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting {!Case.Business_Unit__c}! Unfortunately, we are unable to assist you without receiving additional information. If you would like to re-open this request, please reply click here
Your Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
All the best, Your {!Case.Business_Unit__c} Customer Service Team
